details: Research potential speakers and invitees for the tech-centered round table conferences, focusing on AI, Blockchain, Digital Healthcare, and Autonomous Machines, as well as connecting VCs, educators, startups, and big tech firms in Silicon Valley

Prepared contracts, amendments, product schedules and other documents for the International Television DepartmentVerified rights availability for licensing and distribution deals, ensuring the contractual terms of the document are soundStreamlined and analyzed internal and external reports, by developing templates and working with COSMOS databaseAided in SOX auditing process to help maintain the health of the compliance department and its contractual documents
